short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DropWired - AliExpress Product Importer and Order Automator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DropWired is a drop shipping solution that allows you to easily import products from the AliExpress website to your ShopWired online store in just a few clicks. 

You can browse through AliExpress, choosing the products you want to import and clicking a simple button to do so. 

Once you’ve finished, you can review the products you’ve imported in your DropWired account and make any amendments you want to before listing the products on your ShopWired account. 

When you receive orders from customers on those AliExpress products, DropWired automates the order fulfilment process for you to make it quick and easy to place your orders. Simply click an ‘order now’ button in DropWired and let the extension do all the heavy lifting for you, adding products to the basket, choosing delivery methods and entering delivery addresses, all you need to do is enter card information. 

A quick note (entered automatically by the extension) asks the AliExpress supplier not to include an invoice or paperwork with the order, this is drop shipping at it’s finest. 

The extension also works to receive updates from AliExpress about dispatch and order tracking information. 

DropWired is a great tool to let you focus on making sales and growing your business, without having to worry about product suppliers, warehouses or order fulfilment. 

Main extension features:

Import products from AliExpress to ShopWired in a couple of clicks
Order products from AliExpress with an automatic process
Sync order status and tracking information from AliExpress to ShopWired
